Uses of Interface
suncertify.api.DBConnection

Packages that use DBConnection
suncertify.api   
suncertify.impl

Uses of DBConnection in suncertify.api
 

Methods in suncertify.api that return DBConnection
 DBConnection DBConnectionFactory.getLocal()
          Returns a reference to local database server connector running in the same JVM bypassing all networking.
 DBConnection DBConnectionFactory.getRemote(java.lang.String host, int port)
          Returns a reference to a remote database server connector looked up in RMI registry located on a given host listening on the given port number.
 

Uses of DBConnection in suncertify.impl
 

Subinterfaces of DBConnection in suncertify.impl
 interface RemoteDBConnection
          Remote RMI interface of database connection.
 

Classes in suncertify.impl that implement DBConnection
 class DBConnectionImpl
          Implementation of the public database interface.
 

Uses of DBConnection in suncertify.ui
 

Constructors in suncertify.ui with parameters of type DBConnection
DataTableFrame(DBConnection connection)
          Creates a frame object with the proper database connector.
UIController(ContractorTableModel model, DBConnection dbConn)
          Creates a controller with a database connector for database calls and table model for getting the current UI state.
